nodes.excerpt: GPU.LAND offers GPU instances for Deep Learning â€” at dirt-cheap prices. How cheap? Up to 80% cheaper vs major cloud providers. We believe everyone, and not just "Big Tech", should be able to train AI models. So we built the cheapest place on the web to do it.
nodes.title: GPU.LAND - Affordable cloud GPUs for deep learning
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Can't find the right words to start a conversation? We have used GPT-3 to generate dozens of thousands of Tinder openers and picked the best of them (according to our limited experience).
nodes.title: +500 Openers for Tinder written by GPT-3 - GPT-3 generated thousands of openers & we picked the best
nodes.author: Jan A. Kolar

nodes.excerpt: Macro helps teams supercharge their manual and repetitive processes. Our powerful checklist allows teams to quickly document processes, assign tasks, track progress, and automate common actions.

nodes.excerpt: Find the most converting headline on your landing site with Juggler! It is an intuitive and straightforward A/B testing tool for your site and it's fully online. Just add the lightweight script on your site and you are ready to find the best headline!
nodes.title: Juggler.dev - The easiest way to proceed A/B testing on your site
nodes.author: Vlad Dekhanov

nodes.excerpt: BlockSurvey is an online form and survey platform with a focus on privacy and security. Think of it as an alternative to SurveyMonkey, Typeform, Google Forms but with a focus on privacy and security. It is powered by Stacks Blockchain.
nodes.title: BlockSurvey 2.0 - Secure forms & surveys, powered by Stacks blockchain
nodes.author: Wilson Bright

nodes.excerpt: Join the Stock Rewards Revolution! Get fractional shares of the brands you love as you shop, automatically. No need to "tap to activate". Simply link as many bank accounts as you like and sit back and earn Stock Rewards.
nodes.title: Bits of Stock - The Stock Rewards App
nodes.author: Arash Asady

nodes.excerpt: A minimalist Flutter framework inspired from TailwindCSS and SwiftUI for rapidly building custom designs.
nodes.title: VelocityX - A minimalist Flutter framework
nodes.author: Mayur Sojitra

nodes.excerpt: Bring your projects up to a whole new level using Artify's illustrations plugin, now available directly inside Figma. Through this new plugin you can search & import over 5000 illustrations with over 70 different design styles directly in your figma projects.
nodes.title: 5000+ illustrations for Figma by Artify - Figma plugin with 5000 illustrations in 70+ design styles

nodes.excerpt: The pack you've been looking for to bring your website or app to the next level. This pack contain 100 animated icons, rendered in svg, ready to be integrated to your website. The pack will be regularily updated with new versions of the icons to fit all your needs.
nodes.title: Iconimations - Svg animated icons pack, ready to be integrated to your site

nodes.excerpt: Take a Walk lets you take virtual walks around the world, filtering by country, time of day and weather. Enjoy the sigths of cities all around the world, and relax with the sounds that they have to offer!
nodes.title: Take a Walk - Relax, in your favorite places on earth

nodes.excerpt: Showwcase is a social network built and optimised for developers. Developers can connect, share their knowledge and showcase their projects with like-minded individuals. For developer content creators, you can make money via paid subscribers.
nodes.title: Showwcase - A social network for developers that lets you make money

nodes.excerpt: Accelerate your development & build fully customizable video-based applications with the performance, scale, and reliability of Zoom's industry leading video-first communications platform. â € Get started at no charge with 10,000 session minutes per month.
nodes.title: Video SDK from Zoom - Build fully customizable video-based apps

nodes.excerpt: Developers have been using the Grouparoo UI to set up automated data movement from their databases to cloud-based tools like Mailchimp. Grouparoo now supports declarative code to set up this pipeline so you manage data sync just like you would any other app.
nodes.title: Grouparoo 2.0 - Integrate with marketing tools using low-code configuration
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

nodes.excerpt: You know how gradients are trendy, but adding a slight noise filter or grain to them is even trendier? Well now you don't have to crack open photoshop to get that effect with your own colors. Just go to noiseandgradient.com!
nodes.title: Noise and Gradient - Generate trendy textures of your own, for free

nodes.title: VS Code Theme Studio - Create your own VS Code theme easily, within your browser

nodes.excerpt: Waving is a gamified social network, targeted for gen-z, we have the coolest features of other traditional social media but we added some sparks of gamification!!! Every action you make is converted to coins and you can change for new features and more range.
nodes.title: Waving - Gamified social network
nodes.author: Gabriel Cantarin

nodes.excerpt: Fishy Products by Adflow is the only GPT-3 copy generation tool that helps you prepare your April Fools' stunt. Our interface is a tribute to the original Mac OS from 1984 (inspired by poolside.fm). â € The AI tool is completely free, no sign-up required!
nodes.title: Fishy Products by Adflow.ai - Generate April Fools' marketing product ideas with AI
nodes.author: Francesco Signoretti

nodes.excerpt: What if programming was about ideas, not semicolons? Compose, abstract, generalise. Start from top down or bottom up and refine as you go. With Nodes, programming feels like sketching on a canvas.
nodes.title: Nodes - Thinking space for exploring ideas with code
nodes.author: Sonu Jung

nodes.excerpt: Recipes are a new way to create step-by-step code walkthroughs right in your ReadMe documentation. By helping you showcase the best use cases for your APIs, it's easy for developers to get started faster while saving your team time on developer support.
nodes.title: ReadMe Recipes - Step-by-step code walkthroughs for your API
nodes.author: Gregory Koberger

nodes.excerpt: GoCopy is an AI writing assistant. We augment your creative process with AI-powered writing tools. Say goodbye to writer's block and get your creative juices flowing.
nodes.title: GoCopy - Make writing easier with GPT-3
nodes.author: Brent Rohner

nodes.excerpt: Connect your SQL database to Clay to insert your query results directly in Google Sheets. Goodbye to hopping between SQL editors, CSV downloads, Excel, and Dashboards. Have your financial models, growth charts, and customer lists always up to date!
nodes.title: ClaySQL - Run SQL queries directly in Google Sheets
nodes.author: Jordan Banafsheha
